full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Re-tender W0107-23JS05 - Mechanically Refrigerated Salad and Dessert Bar

#### Synopsis
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified suppliers to re-tender for the supply and delivery of a complete mechanically refrigerated salad and dessert bar cabinet unit for the Normandy Kitchen at Garrison Petawawa.

#### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: WS3855564950.Doc3895555641
* **Publication Date**: February 28, 2023
* **Closing Date**: March 10, 2023 at 14:00 EST (Subject to Change, see Amendment below)
* **Contract Term**: Expiry Date: March 31, 2023

#### Key Terms and Conditions

* **Limitations**: The proposed tender is subject to conditions of supply and or delivery. The tender process is subject to conditions, terms and regulations according to the Trade Agreement, for this region of opportunity.
* **Specifications**: Standard Supply Chain Council Supply Chain Operations Reference (SCOR) Manual and IBM/ University of Western Ontario Complete Pronunciation Guide to English and French.
* **Consultation Type**: Request for Proposal - Competitive
* **Trade Agreements**: CKFTA, CCFTA, Canada-Colombia, CFTA, Canada-Panama and Honduras Available 
### Amendment
AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Please disregard the bid invitation about closing time. The bid must be received on or before March 10th at 14:00 EST. Only bids received prior to the closing time will be considered.

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Darlene Keenan ( elle-la / she-her) via  darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
### How to Access the Tender Documentation

To acquire the tender documentation, kindly visit: `http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15554259?extsite=MTU1NTQyNTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==` Please ensure to quote the unique Reference Number on all and any correspondence.
